title: dAmOdara vaibhavam para tattuvamODu
sahitya:
dAmOdara vaibhavam para tattuvamODu nittiyamena 
sattiya nerisiddhigaLODU iNangi niTradu tayir kaDaiyum 
oru kayiTrukkuLLa eyiTraik-kATTiyum kaTTuppaTTadu


anupallavi

  tAmOdum vijayark-koru gItai avan tambikkut-tambiyAgrk-kaTTuNDadO kAdai
nEmAdigaL EmArumippOdai nirkka vaittuk-kaTTi viTTAn annai yashOdai


caraNam    aravak-koDiyOnum kaTTip-pArttAn akAsuran nenjukkuLLE vaittAn
kurUrannaik-kalattinuL vaittAL andak-kOlAhalamellAm ik-kutUhalattaik-kETTuttAn
